item.title: Help on item use with an object
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

                          	else if(useItemID == 5291 && atObjectID == 7846) // Farming Guam
			{
                            sendMessage("You plant the "+GetItemName(5291)+" and recieve a guam and some xp.");
                            addSkillXP((10*playerLevel[19]), 19);
                            deleteItem([b]5291[/b],getItemSlot([b]249[/b]), 1);
	addItem(249,1);
			}
                                                                     ^Wrong 249 is the herb not the seed

item.title: Help on item use with an object
item.dc:creator: @Dennis Dennis
item.description:
@Dennis wrote:

I have this problem with an item on an object, I cant seem to make the seed disappear when i click on the patch but i get a guam

else if(useItemID == 5291 && atObjectID == 7846) // Farming Guam { sendMessage("You plant the "+GetItemName(5291)+" and recieve a guam and some xp."); addSkillXP((10*playerLevel[19]), 19); deleteItem(5291,getItemSlot(249), 1); addItem(249,1); }

If anyone could help me make this work (delete seeds) it would be greatly appreciated.

Ty

Read full topic
